headline: Co-founder & CTO @ Tinai | YCombinator S21 | Amazon

experiences.title: Software Engineer
experiences.description:
I worked for Amazon Rhapsody team, which is part of the innovative initiative arm of Amazon Retail. The team main focus is to introduce a new virtual try on experience that would serve millions of Amazon customers and help them find the right fit and style of their clothes from the comfort of their home.

During the time there, I have built and launch Amazon's Made For You feature, a mobile feature that let the customer create a 3D model avatar of themselves so they can see how different piece of clothes fit into their body. Later on I was leading the effort to scale up the Made For You program, expanding it from only a few products in the initial launch to hundred of thousands products in collaboration with Merch By Amazon program.
experiences.location: New York, New York, United States

experiences.title: Software Engineer
experiences.description: I work for Amazon Advertising, building the backend system that controls the ads pacing in Amazon Ads exchange system. Our system handles millions of ads bid request every day, try to assign the right ads to the right campaign/advertisers.

experiences.title: Software Engineer
experiences.description: I worked for Amazon Fashion team within Amazon Retail. During my time there, I have transformed a 3D shoe visualization software from desktop version to mobile version, reduce the size of the software by at least 5x and help launched it on Amazon mobile app and mobile web. After that I was part of the globalization of the feature, expand it from US market to 5 other markets in EU. My work there included localization the feature for each market, setting up infrastructure and scale up machines, setting up and manage alarms and monitor during the launch.

experiences.title: Software Engineering Intern
experiences.description: Working on Global Payment team, design and build a ticket system that help oncall engineer to detect problems faster. The system also help categorize and assign the issues to the correct teams by analyzing the content of the issues.

experiences.title: Equipment room monitor
experiences.description: Manage and monitor all the tools and equipments for outdoor activities in the school's equipment room.

experiences.title: Tutor
experiences.description: Answer questions, assist students in solving their programming assignments.

experiences.title: Founder
experiences.description: Teach other students about web development with Django and HTML5. Connect students who share interest in web development and group them working under interesting projects.

experiences.title: Software Engineering Intern
experiences.description:
DataDashboard
• Migrated the product from using MySQL to MongoDB, increasing the site’s loading speed by 10 times
• Wrote the front-end and designed the database for funnel, a new feature that analyzes the data about any sequence of actions that users perform in each website
• Fixed 12 bugs/tickets in project’s Bitbucket repository within 2 weeks 
ResearchBroker
• Wrote unit test cases for the web application, including writing a mockup function to emulate LinkedIn’s API

experiences.title: Logistics Manager Assistance
experiences.description: Taking responsibility of the logistics tasks for a conference that served more than three hundreds guests, contacted and signed contract with hotel’s managers to rent venue for the conference, prepared all the materials (booklets, flyers, brochures, etc.)

accomplishment_projects.title: FiveColCourse
accomplishment_projects.description: An independent project that collect more than 5000 courses from five different schools in the Five College Consortium into one website, building on top of these data an application that let students to quickly looking for courses and then adding them to their own schedule.

accomplishment_projects.title: Swapshire
accomplishment_projects.description: An commerce website available to members of the five college community in order to buy, sell, and swap items and services.
